story.title: AITA for Stealing My Neighbor's WiFi... with a Llama?
story.description: In this hilarious tale, someone questions their sanity after using a llama to 'borrow' their neighbor's WiFi. The absurdity unfolds in a way you won’t believe!

messages.content: So, I kinda used a llama to steal my neighbor's WiFi. AITA?
Did you at least name the llama 'Llama Llama Ding Dong'? 😂
Of course! He’s my WiFi buddy now. But the neighbor caught me and freaked out. 😬
Wait, your neighbor has a llama-proof fence? How do you even plan that? 😂
I thought llamas were like furry ninjas. Turns out, they just want to eat grass and stare at you. 🙄
What did your neighbor say when they caught you? Did you blame it on the llama? 😂
Exactly! I said, 'It wasn’t me, it was the llama!' They looked confused af. 😆
How did you even explain that at the police station? 'Uh, officer, my llama has a better connection.' 🤣
And what if they start a neighborhood llama squad? Prepare for a turf war! 😂
Honestly, I'd join the squad. But I’d make it clear: my llama gets the good WiFi. 😜
